interestingcomments.content: Designed and built a greenhouse. Can’t collapse from snow. Half the cost of a kit 14’x24’ X 12’ high - can easily make longer. Used 3/4” heavy galvanized pipe. Put together with steeltek fittings using Allen wrench screws. Pipe is half price at Lowe’s.
interestingcomments.MarkedSent: -----> designed !!!  and built a greenhouse. can’t collapse from snow. half the cost of a kit 14’x24’ x 12’ high - can easily make longer. used 3/4” heavy galvanized pipe. put together with steeltek fittings using allen wrench screws. pipe is half price at lowe’s.
